page.title: 20NEWS EVENTS CUCKFIELD 1985
page.content: Councillors, Villagers and Builders attended the opening of the new lavatories in June. The lavatories in Broad Street Car Park were built for Mid Sussex District Council at a cost of Â£32,000. A copper map of Cuckfield commissioned by Cuckfield Neighbourhood Council was unveiled at the opening. Ansty village has a new village sign. The original Jubilee Day sign erected in 1977 went missing from the village green almost a year ago. Oak posts which surround the sign have been replaced or repaired. Cuckfield Rural Parish Council provided the funds for the work. A book entitled 'Cuckfield in old Picture Postcards' has just been produced by Maisie Wright who lives in the village. The pictures used date between 1882-1930. Price Â£6.95.
